The obtained TG/DTG data related to samples mass decrease in correlation with temperature was used to calculate the kinetics parameters ( A is the frequency factor, E
a is the activation energy) and the calculus was performed using the following kinetic Eq. ( 2):

where: ⍺ is the amount of vaporized sample, t is the time, n is the apparent reaction order, k is the vaporization constant rate.
